insert into oa_financing_ledger (year, month, type, bank_id, project_name, amount, financing_amount, total_lending, total_replay_loan, remain_loan, deadline, rate, guaranty, key_node, create_time, update_time) values (#{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bankId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{financingAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalLending,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalReplayLoan,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remainLoan,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deadline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{guaranty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyNode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update oa_financing_ledger set year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, month = #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bank_id = #{bankId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, financing_amount = #{financingAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_lending = #{totalLending,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_replay_loan = #{totalReplayLoan,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, remain_loan = #{remainLoan,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, deadline = #{deadline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rate = #{rate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, guaranty = #{guaranty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, key_node = #{keyNode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, year, month, type, bank_id, project_name, amount, financing_amount, total_lending, total_replay_loan, remain_loan, deadline, rate, guaranty, key_node, create_time, update_time from oa_financing_ledger where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
